title: 5. How Is a Bad Radio Station Like Our Public-School System?
description: In this episode of Freakonomics Radio, we explore a way to make 1.1 million schoolkids feel like they have 1.1 million teachers.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
